titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Greater Kansas City Council on Religion and Race Collection
titlestmt.subtitle: Greater Kansas City Council on Religion and Race records, 1960-1993
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by rh, 2006.

did.head: COLLECTION SUMMARY

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of KansasKenneth Spencer Research Library Kansas Collection

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Greater Kansas City Council on Religion and Race

did.unittitle: Greater Kansas City Council on Religion and Race records

physdesc.extent: 16.5 linear ft (17 boxes), 1 oversize box, 3 oversize folders

did.abstract: This collection of the records of the Greater Kansas City Council on Religion and Race includes administrative records of the organization and collected information on issues of interest, particularly fair housing and education.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Greater Kansas City Council on Religion and Race papers Collection , Kansas Collection, RH MS 786, Kenneth Spencer Research Library, University of Kansas Libraries

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Spencer Library staff may determine use restrictions dependent on the physical condition of manuscript materials.
